REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G L M T f2393 reute u f BC-BRAZIL-BANK-STRIKE-CO 03-31 0051

TEXT.TITLE: BRAZIL BANK STRIKE CONTINUES INTO FIFTH DAY
TEXT.BODY: A national bank strike which began a week ago continued today with most of Brazil's 700,000 bankworkers on strike, union officials said. The stock markets of Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro were closed for the fifth consecutive working day. Reuter
